ComicInfo.Editor: Hannah Gorfinkel Elder,Joseph Rybandt,Molly Mahan,Rich Young
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:51:34 [Issue ID 4000-484916] urn:comicvine:4000-484916 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 21:31:19. [Issue ID 1326472]
ComicInfo.Summary:
When mysteries in Seoni the sorcerer’s past lead her to the renowned Jeggare Museum, she finds its newest acquisition targeted by deadly thieves. Joining with the mercenary magus Seltyiel, her plan to capture the criminals unmasks their underhanded leader, but also a menace from an age of forgotten evil. A tale of magic and ancient secrets from Pathfinder editor-in-chief F. Wesley Schneider (Pathfinder: Goblins!) with art by Tom Garcia (Clive Barker’s Hellraiser)! Contains pull-out poster map and official Pathfinder RPG bonus encounter!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Stjepan Sejic | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Tom Garcia & Kim Mohan | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover | Sean Izaakse & Kim Mohan | 3 | D/LE | Ultra-Limited Edition Variant Cover | Jorge Faras | 4 | E/RE | Paizo.com Exclusive Cover | Sebastian Cichon | Missing |
